title: On the set of associated radicals of powers of monomial ideals
authors: Nguyen Thu Hang and Truong Thi Hien
abstract:
Let $I$ be a monomial ideal in a polynomial ring. In this paper, we study the
asymptotic behavior of the set of associated radical ideals of the (symbolic)
powers of $I$. We show that both $\asr(I^s)$ and $\asr(I^{(s)})$ need not
stabilize for large value of $s$. In the case $I$ is a square-free monomial
ideal, we prove that $\asr(I^{(s)})$ is constant for $s$ large enough. Finally,
if $I$ is the cover ideal of a balanced hypergraph, then $\asr(I^s)$
monotonically increases in $s$.
